xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/662143-Dov'è Sisifo?! 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/i9VcVbbZjJvmsBXFXM7RwpCeXjW.jpg Three stories revolving around 3 elements: the painting, the sofa and the comet. The 3 chapters that compose it are also linked together by these elements that give the entire film a circular structure, just like the sad fate of Sisyphus who was condemned to push a huge stone to the top of a hill. Dov'è Sisifo?!
